features: One 6 oz. bottle of Alba Botanica Hemp Calming Cleanser
Removes dirt and excess oil without over-drying or stripping skin of natural oils
Made with a plant-based blend of botanical ingredients that uplifts complexion to a bright, calm, refreshed, and healthy-looking glow
100% vegetarian formula made without harsh ingredients like parabens, phthalates, or synthetic fragrances
Always cruelty-free, never tested on animals; recognized by the Leaping Bunny Program
body.description: Alba Botanica Hemp Calming Cleanser helps remove dirt and excess oil without over-drying or stripping skin of natural oils to uplift your complexion to a bright, calm, refreshed & healthy-looking glow! Formulated with cold-pressed hemp seed oil, witch hazel & shea butter.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Alba Botanica Hemp Calming Cleanser Alba Botanica Calming Cleanser helps remove dirt and excess oil without over-drying or stripping skin of natural oils to uplift your complexion to a bright, calm, refreshed & healthy-looking glow! Formulated with witch hazel & shea butter. Our 100% vegetarian formula is hypo-allergenic and does not contain any parabens, phthalates or harsh sulfates. It is also not tested on animals.

Leaping Bunny Certified* Alba Botanica is grounded in compassion and the ethical treatment of all living things. We look out for our furry friends by ensuring that none of our products, or any of the ingredients in them, are tested on animals. The Leaping Bunny* logo is an internationally recognized symbol for cruelty-free cosmetics, personal care, and household products. *Certification for cruelty free was given by the CCIC on October 1st, 2008. 100% Vegetarian* We love our friends, including the furry kind. That’s why we never test our products or any of the ingredients in them on animals. Our products contain no meat or by-products of animals. We also exclude all cruelly obtained animal ingredients. *see ingredients list No Harsh Sulfates* We believe in using natural ingredients and not harsh sulfates that can damage the hair and scalp. Products that have too strong of a sulfate presence have been known to break down naturally occurring oils in your hair and scalp. At Alba Botanica, we provide products that advocate for a healthy scalp and healthy hair, without using harsh sulfates. *see ingredients list

The Alba Botanica brand was born in 1979 and follows a simple mission – to Do Beautiful. To honor that vision, we created a vibrant line of body-loving products that nourish the skin, hair, and of course, the soul. Whether we’re creating a fan favorite formula or working on the next big thing, we’re dedicated to making high quality, 100% vegetarian products that overflow with botanical ingredients. From the choices we make in the field to the final products we put on shelves, we aim to help fellow women look beautiful on the outside while feeling beautiful on the inside.

Alba Botanica Hawaiian Facial Cleanser, Pore Purifying Pineapple Enzyme Alba Botanica Even & Bright Enzyme Scrub Alba Botanica Hawaiian Detox Cleanser Alba Botanica Acnedote Maximum Strength Face & Body Scrub More Hawaiian Hair Care Products from Alba Botanica This pore purifying cleanser, made with pineapple and papaya, washes away impurities, make-up and dullness. This gentle scrub, made with ground walnut shell powder, fights off dull, dry skin for a smooth, even complexion. This self-warming cleanser helps clear up oily and blackhead-prone skin with a blend of botanical ingredients that create a gentle and beneficial warming sensation. Made with a 2% salicylic acid and willow bark solution, this astringent treats and prevents acne and breakouts.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Staple for the Price
reviews.reviewText: Slim to no scent, which I appreciate. Gentle on the skin and leaves my face feeling smooth after. This is the only product I use on my face and I feel like it does a really good job of cleaning my skin without using unnecessarily harsh chemicals or leaving redness. You won't beat the price and has been my go-to product for years. Granted, I don't have super sensitive skin so I can't speak to how it does with that skin type, but I can say it feels gentle on my skin and has never caused any breakouts. It's free from harsh chemicals according to the box and doesn't have a noticeable scent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The very best facial cleanser I’ve ever used. I had black heads on my nose, dry patches on my forehead etc.They are all cleared and I would highly recommend this product.Love the shampoo also

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Did not like
reviews.reviewText: Not suitable for my oily skin type

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Unfortunately dried my face out
reviews.reviewText: I wanted to like this, but I just don't. I have combo, sensitive skin and this really dried my face out. It would get really red and stingy after I used it. I must have a sensitivity to hemp oil, which makes me sad, or it's the fragrance. I actually didn't mind the smell. it was a little weird at first, to me it smelled like banana boat sunscreen. The consistency was nice and it did a good job to cleanse, but my skin can't take it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love this product. It doesn't strip. It removes the makeup also.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It really calms my redness in my checks down every time I wash my face. This is my new staple for facial care.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 12, 2023
